COMPLETE GEOTECHNICAL EXPERTISE IN A SINGLE FIRM

Summit Geoengineering Services (SGS) delivers deep geotechnical expertise and responsive service that adapts to changing project needs and schedules to save time and money for public, private, and institutional clients throughout Northern New England.

SGS is a Pre-Qualified Consultant for Professional Services by the Maine Bureau of General Services and with the Maine Department of Transportation for Consulting under 804.10 – Geotechnical Investigations and Engineering Services

Service Driven by Our Commitment.

SGS’s strength is its highly qualified professionals who are committed to work closely with our clients from project conception to completion. This personal commitment ensures that we obtain comprehensive project knowledge, provide straightforward communication, and demonstrate – every day to every client on every project – our dedication to making your project our top priority.

A Passion for Better Communities

A Passion for Collaboration

A Passion for Quality

THE SUMMIT DIFFERENCE: RISING TO THE TOP

Complete Geotechnical Services and Supporting Exploration and Laboratory Services in a Single Firm

Join us!

When you join the SGS Team, you will have the opportunity to quickly gain diverse experience on a wide variety of projects as you side-by-side with some of the most talented and dedicated experts in the industry.
